name: Men's Comp 4/3mm Full Wetsuit
description: Light Weight Flexibility. The Comp is the lightest, most stretchy wetsuit we offer. The 100% ultra-stretch exterior combined with our Thermolite IR core, and critically taped seams, make this Men's 4/3mm wetsuit insanely comfortable.

name: Women’s E7 Flashbomb Heatseeker 4/3 Zip Free Wetsuit
description: The new E7 Flashbomb HeatSeeker 4/3 Zip Free Wetsuit is our most technically advanced cold-water wetsuit. This season, we're combining our all new E7 Flash Lining through out the wetsuit and our unique Version 2 Flex Energy lining that generates even more heat when stretched. Along with added superior technical features, the Flashbomb Heat Seeker is our warmest and stretchiest Flashbomb yet.

name: Channel Islands Rocket Wide
description: The Channel Islands Rocket Wide Surfboard is the incredibly user-friendly cousin of the Rocket 9. It's a shorter, wider skate machine designed to lift the fun factor when the waves are not a their best. Introducing the Rocket Wide. The incredibly user-friendly cousin of the Rocket 9. "My brothers and I loved the speed and control we were feeling with the Rocket 9 and we wanted to see how we could apply those same levels of fun and performance to a board for small and gutless waves. The Rocket Wide features a wider tail block to skate across flat sections and a wider nose area to accommodate for better paddle power. It's a shorter, wider skate machine designed to lift the fun factor when the waves are not a their best. So don't let those small days get you down cause the Rocket Wide is ready for blast off!!" Available stock in 3 or 5 fin configurations. Advanced surfers will ride this 2″-4″ shorter than their height.

name: SURF TERRY BAJA HOODIE IN INDIGO
description: For milder months, Todd wanted a hoodie that looked solid yet felt light — the sort of layer that would carry you from a cool spring morning to a breezy beach cookout and still slide effortlessly under a sportcoat. The unlock was a soft and textural French terry cloth made from Peruvian cotton, garment-dyed and washed to look broken-in from the first wear. It looks like a sweatshirt but has the drape and lightness of a tee — in other words, perfect for summer. Our Surf Terry Baja Hoodie is loaded with quality details: cover-stitching on exterior seams, raglan sleeves, a drawstring hood, and a button placket.

name: Hot Rod Surf Velvet 9'0
description: Hot Rod Surf Velvet Model all around noserider. The Velvet is a specially shaped longboard that is maneuverable and easy to handle measuring in at 9’0 to 9’3 range. Versatile in all conditions the Velvet is a little shorter and narrower that the Tourmaline and Illuminator Models which can be advantageous in larger surf as well as being nimble on smaller summer and spring days. Upon special request The Velvet is also available in a ‘Classic’ longer retro shape reminiscent of longboards from the late 50’s and early 60’s with bigger rails, more belly, and maximized volume. The Velvet is a narrower and shorter range length noserider. Shaped by Mark Whitney Mehran

name: HYPERFREAK S-SEAM FADE 20" BOARDSHORTS
description: This is our classic Hyperfreak stretch boardshort, designed to keep you surfing longer. Stretch fabrication offers the perfect amount of flex while quick-dry, anti-rash technology is used to maximize comfort and improve drying time.

name: SHEIN Men Letter & Tropical Graphic Tee
description: Supperrrrr cute shirt love love love. Only problem is that you'd have to wear a more nude bra color if your planning on being more modest. Other than that, def recommend. All size info is accurate.

name: Boardwalk Global Entry 20"
description: Tried and true, the Global Entry Evolution 20" Boardwalk, has you covered. The Global Entry is our most feature-rich Boardwalk, constructed with 4-way Cordura nylon stretch fabric with quick dry properties, stow pockets for your phone and wallet, internal draw cord and premium heat welded zippers. Stay sharp with the ultimate hybrid travel shorts.

name: Anti-Series Soft Tech Fleece
description: The Anti-Series Soft Tech Fleece is a ground-breaking men's winter warmer that acts as the ultimate wind-breaker, has a DWR water repellent treatment, and feels like your favourite soft brushed fleece. Finished with adjustable hood, zip pockets, and now available in a wider range of sizes.

These full grain leather sandals have a built in bottle opener? And arch support? And a non marking rubber outsole with excellent traction? Hold our beer. For beer on the beach moments no matter where the water is, there's the REEF Draftsmen.
name: REEF DRAFTSMEN FLIP FLOPS
MYSTIC 2mm Neoprene Beanie
description: Mystic's classic neoprene beanie – this beanie is sufficiently thick and keeps your head warm in bitter windchill. Available in an array of colors, this beanie features an adjustable loop with a clip on the back so that you won't lose it in the water.

name: Rip Curl Womens Swimsuit On The Coast Long Sleeve Surfsuit
description: Designed with an all-over yardage print, with key hole back detail, the On The Coast Long Sleeve Surfsuit is an epic women's one piece swimsuit. Offering good support and coverage, tie back, and removable padding.

name: The Fishnet Crewneck Cover-Up
description: Designed with versatility (and easy packing) in mind, our new Fishnet Crewneck Cover-Up goes with all your favorite swimsuits. Chic and oh-so breezy, it's made from fishnet-inspired material that shows off a peek of your suit. You'll love the drapey, relaxed fit and mid-hip length that provides just the right amount of coverage.

name: REEF CUSHION VISTA
description: Do we at REEF have a favorite sandal? Does a parent have a favorite child? Never. (But some favorites are more favorite than others. We love these perfectly proportioned sandals, with a soft double vegan leather strap, modern silhouette and high-energy rebound footbed. But if any of our other shoes asks, we never said this.)

name: Rip Curl Men's Automatic Watch with Polyurethane Strap, Black, 26 (Model: A1119),Mignight 21
Public Goods Reusable Cotton Tote Bag
Vernor Hybrid
description: This is the most user friendly surfboard on the market. The thickness from your crotch to your chest area resembles a 9' longboard and the width in the nose gives you a paddling advantage. From the middle of the board to the tail you have characteristics of a contemporary shortboard. Having one of these boards in your quiver will definitely improve your wave count and stoke.

name: Padillac
description: The Padillac has been ridden to more big wave contest victories than any other single surfboard design in history! John John Florence won the 2016 Eddie at maxing Waimea, Billy Kemper rode them to an unbelievable 4 Jaws wins (and a second place) AND got what is considered the greatest Jaws tube ride so far! Mark Healey gave it the name, and was instrumental in developing and testing the design which he was on when he won the 2014 Billabong XXL Biggest Paddle Award! In the past few years Nathan Florence, JJF, Makua and Koa Rothman, Eli Olson, Billy Kemper, Nic Von Rupp and a bunch of other crazy f@#$ers have put it to the test in the world's biggest waves and they all come back saying it's the best big wave board they have had.

name: STAY COVERED HEAVY DUTY HAND TIED SURFBOARD LEASH - 6' X 5 16ths" (8MM)
description: These Heavy Duty Hand Tied leashes are the most versatile leash in the Stay Covered line. You can use this leash on your Stand Up in small to medium sized waves or on your step up at double overhead Puerto Escondido. The hand tied feature eliminates weak points creating a leash you can trust. Stay Covered uses a #90 durometer cord to create a slightly softer leash, reducing tangles and creating a perfect blend of stretch and memory retention.

name: Original 6-Pack | Cold
description: Long lasting and easy to apply. Optimal for water temps from 60°F and below.

name: STUSSY X SALT & STONE TINTED SUNSCREEN STICK
description: SALT & STONE has collaborated with Californian sportswear brand Stussy on a natural sunscreen face stick. The broad spectrum, water resistant, and reef safe face stick goes on smooth without any white residue. Formulated with a natural tint to blend into all skin tones. Perfect protection for a morning session in the Pacific. This exclusive product is only available at Salt & Stone and Stussy and can't be found anywhere else. This product is excluded from all promotional discounts and offers.

name: R3 Legacy Series
description: The R3 Legacy Series is an xsmall sized thruster in the Rake template category. The increased rake provides hold through turns, and the Honeycomb construction gives a balanced feel for all-around performance.

name: Ding ALL 4 Oz All Super Polyester Repair Kit for Medium to Large Sized Polyester Surfboards Repairs
description: THE ORIGINAL POLYESTER SANDING RESIN: Ding All Polyester Resin contains Silmar brand 250A UV Polyester Sanding Resin, which is the undisputed, highest-quality resin available to the industry. Sanding Resin is typically used for surfboard hot-coats and is widely popular for use with dings repairs   LARGER SURFBOARD REPAIRS KIT: Purposed for larger polyester ding repairs, this kit contains ultra clear, non-yellowing and UV Stable 4oz. sanding resin plus hardener. Average cure time is: Gel -6 to 10 minutes, hard in 45 to 60 minutes @ 77 degrees F   ALLOWS EASY SANDING: This resin is non tacky and dries smooth providing the user an easy surface to finish sanding  A COMPLETE REPAIR KIT: This MADE IN USA kit come with 4oz. sanding resin plus hardener, fiberglass cloth (6” x 27”), 2 sided sanding pad, 2x measuring cups, 6 x mixing sticks/applicators, Q-Cell White Filler, bonus - Sun Cure 1 oz. mini fiberfill tube, 2 cover sheet and easy instructions.mmBONUS SUN CURE RESIN: If smaller dings are being fixed, the kit comes complete with our world-famous Sun Cure Epoxy Fiberfill resin. Packed with fiberglass strands for strength, Sun Cure will get the job done in minutes after sun/UV exposure

name: All Time Long Sleeve UPF 50 Rashguard
description: One and done. The All Time Long Sleeve Rashguard for men will likely be the best and last rashguard you ever buy. You're looking at a legend. With built-in UPF 50 sun protection and made from recycled polyester, this legendary rashguard has been a surfer's go-to for countless years and a couple of million waves. Snug fit, classic Quik logo details, and good to go in pools too, this rashguard is an essential tool no surf kit should be without.

name: Eargasm Aquaplugs
description: Enjoy your favorite activities, without worrying about water entering your ears! Get the perfect fit with 4 different ear tip sizes included with every package.3 different ear wing sizes and included connector cord keep your Aquaplugs secure in your ear and minimize risk of loss.Protect your ears from water while still being able to hear your surroundings clearly. Great for surfing, swimming, and other water activities.Comes with a waterproof aluminum case for easy transport.100% reusable and washable so that you can use your Aquaplugs over and over.

name: Rip Curl 3 Piece Traction Pad
description: Rip Curl's 3 Piece Traction is a great three-piece tail pad, made of a thin closed cell high density perforated EVA. Cut with a deep diamond groove and designed with base flex groove, for superior adhesion.

name: SIMBA SENTIEL NO LOGO PEARL WHITE SURF HELMET
description: The Simba Sentiel No Logo Pearl White Surf Helmet. A lightweight, low-profile helmet engineered specifically for the safety of surfers and water sports enthusiasts. The Sentinel 1’s technically advanced design provides high-level impact protection with optimum aquadynamic performance.

name: Infinity Boardshort
description: Inspired by surfer Rob Machado, the Infinity Boardshort has all the details you need for your best session yet. Moisture-wicking fabric with 4-way stretch and an interior neoprene waistband keep you comfortable in the waves (and lounging in the sand after), while the zip pocket keeps your keys or other essentials safe and secure. Built with recycled materials and upcycled coconut making them naturally anti-microbial as well. Beach days just got better.

name: Cruise Boardshort
description: Built like everyday shorts and made partially with recycled materials, the Cruise Boardshorts in our VCycled™ fabric are your best piece to transition from water to life. With a scalloped leg and high-performance fit, these boardshorts were made with a nod to our Mother Ocean.

name: Apex Trunks By Kelly Slater
description: There’s no trunk like the Apex, literally. Developed and tested by the 11x World Champion Kelly Slater and sustainably engineered for maximum performance. Did we also mention it’s made from plastic water bottles?

name: SurfSilk Tijuana 19" Boardshorts
description: We headed to ol' Mexico to find the inspiration for these men's' boardshort's print and colors. But its performance and design are definitely from the future. Our exclusive SurfSilk performance fabric is what gives these surf trunks their superpower. Made from recycled water bottles, the outside is as tough as steel while the inside wears extremely soft and smooth against your skin. No rubbing, no rashing, just a supremely comfortable feel. And as for mobility, you won't find a boardshort with as much pop. 4-way stretch boosts the fabric with flex right where you need it. Progressive surfing requires progressive style. And you can rely on the SurfSilk Tijuana 19" Boardshort for men to deliver the best of both

name: Men's Lightweight All-Wear Hemp Volley Shorts - 7"
description: Everyday shorts with a 7" inseam are made of lightweight organic cotton/hemp fabric for cool-wearing comfort in hot weather. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.

name: Swim Board Short
description: Designed with high-performance features and an elevated look, for in and out of the water. Inseam length is 8.75". Pair with our Stealth Boxer Brief.

name: Sundays Slim Fit Short Sleeve Button-Up Shirt
description: A sweet tropical print defines a breezy shirt cut from pure organic cotton.

name: Stretch Riviera Short Sleeve Shirt
description: Our best seller for a reason. A few reasons, actually: Original prints, comfy stretch & a better fit

name: ROCKDALE SHORT SLEEVE WOVEN SHIRT
description: Add a feather to your camp with this floral-and-feather-motif camp-style shirt. Pre-washed, slubby poplin is the ideal spring and summer material, perfect to take you from beach to beverages. A great neutral shade, too, to throw over a tee or wear on its own.

name: TAME SHIRT
description: An easy to wear button-up shirt that goes great with shorts or jeans. It has a quality cotton, modern design that fits slimmer in the body and sleeves.

name: BILLABONG Unity Stack Mens T-Shirt
description: Billabong Unity Stack tee. Featuring Billabong graphic front center. Ribbed neck crew. Short sleeve. 100% Cotton. Machine wash. Imported.

name: BILLABONG Coastline Mens Flannel
description: Billabong Coastline Flannel. All over pattern. Pocket on left chest. Flat collar. Button front. Long sleeves. 100% Cotton. Machine wash. Imported.

name: BLUES LONG SLEEVE TEE
description: Wear this and be reminded paradise is a state of mind. A peaceful blossom with REEF's logo keeps things beachy on this tee. It's made with 100% soft cotton jersey, to instantly become one of your comfortable faves.

name: Legacy T-Shirt: Black
description: 200GSM 100% carded cotton // Standard Fit // Front Screen Print

name: COME THRU
description: Are you going to COME THRU? This modern cat eye features invisible, injection frames that put the focus on a range of mirrored + new blackout lenses that completely conceal the eyes. Show up and show out in these fan faves sunnies.

name: All Day Overdyed Layback Boardshorts 17"
description: The All Day Overdyed Layback Boardshort are meant to be worn all day, whether you’re in the surf or on the sand. Made with recycler surf suede, these layback boardshorts have water repellent coating with a lightweight and quick drying durable fabric. Garment overdye adds a buttery hand feel and high/low color dimension. Finished with an elastic waist for comfort and side and back patch pockets.

name: SurfSilk Washed 18" Boardshorts
description: A unique washed treatment gives these boardshorts their vintage, slightly faded appearance. But there's nothing old-school about how they perform. Our exclusive SurfSilk performance fabric is what gives these surf trunks their superpower. Made from recycled water bottles, the outside is as tough as steel while the inside wears extremely soft and smooth against your skin. No rubbing, no rashing, just a supremely comfortable feel. And as for mobility, you won’t find a boardshort with as much pop. 4-way stretch boosts the fabric with flex right where you need it. Progressive surfing requires progressive style. And you can rely on the SurfSilk Washed 18" Boardshort for men to deliver the best of both.

name: CORD LOCAL SHORT
description: The Cord Local Short is a vintage-inspired walk-short made up of 98% cotton and 2% spandex 16-wale corduroy. Utilizing our 17" outseam 'Local Short' block, The Cord Local features front welt side seam pockets, elastic waistband with drawcords, back welt pockets, faux fly, and internal diagonal pinstripe binding.

name: Boardwalk Phase 21"
description: The Phase Boardwalk is another popular Rip Curl walkshort with hydrophobic and quick-dry properties. Its multi blend stretch fabric, standard fit, and 21" outseam exude a quiet confidence. A rock solid staple you can wear anywhere.

name: H2O-DRI MARWICK WALKSHORTS 20"
description: A GO ANYWHERE SHORT, THE DRI MARWICK 20" FEATURE H2O-DRI MATERIAL TO KEEP YOU COOL AND DRY, WHILE A STRETCH WAISTBAND DELIVERS COMFORT THAT MOVES WITH YOU.

name: Renzo Sherpa Lined Hoodie
description: Look cool and fashionable wearing this super cozy and warm O'Neill Renzo Sherpa Lined Hoodie featuring high-pile fleece.

name: AQUA BRIDGE LOGO CREW SWEATSHIRT
description: Aqua bridge logo, our take on a San Francisco landmark, screened in international orange on a dark heather gray sweatshirt

name: Waterman After Surf Hoodie
description: Your post-session sidekick— mellow down and warm up in the Waterman After Surf Hoodie. Featuring logo embroidery at the chest, this Waterman Classic men's sweatshirt has a regular fit with ribbed bands and pocket details. Heavyweight french terry keeps it feeling seriously soft and comfortable for your post-surf chill.

name: BORA PULLOVER HOODIE
description: Kick it old school tropical with this soft, warm fleeced hoodie that features a vintage-y REEF graphic. Perfect for surf checks and bonfires.

name: All Day Organic Pullover Hoodie
description: The Billabong All Day Pullover Hoodie brings you ultimate comfort, function and style in one. Made from organic cotton and recycled polyester fabrics, this fleece-lined sweatshirt features an adjustable hood, ribbed trims, pouch pocket and Billabong logo branding at the chest.

name: Byron Bay Hoodie
description: This incredible hoodie pairs everyday versatility with some serious style. It’s knit from five different colors of yarn to create the sea-and-sunset inspired stripes, while the yarn itself is pure organic cotton for year-round comfort and breathability. Soft and comfortable on the inside, subtly textured on the outside, the Byron goes well beyond the level of your basic sweatshirt.

name: CUSHION SWAMI
description: Whether you pull on the Swami for surf check or work, it's built to serve. This sleek boot takes you from day to night in total confidence, but it's the inside that matters. A super soft cushion plus rebound and arch support keep you comfortable, and soft, water.resistant suede keeps you in effortless style.

name: All Day Impact Slip-On Sandals
description: When the path to the sand calls for a little extra comfort, the All Day Impact steps in. Designed with durable comfort, the squishy sandals are built with an anatomically-correct footbed, arch cookie, heel wedge and vegan nubuck upper strap with padding. A textured insole adds traction in wet conditions, while the outsole features a boat-friendly non-scuff material.

name: CUSHION MATEY
description: These shoes are magical: they turn any sidewalk into a boardwalk! Their premium natural fiber uppers and the casual fold.down heel for easy on and off bring REEF's surf style anywhere. Our signature cushion with rebound footbed with heel and arch support, plus a cork topsheet for freshness and breathability, are for real.

name: Tahiti 2mm Reef Walker Boot
description: Shallow-reef sessions just got a whole lot smoother thanks to the Tahiti Reef Walker Bootie. Made with a durable and impenetrable sole, reinforced with internal matting, the reef boot keeps the sharp things out without weighing you down.

name: CUSHION HOMEY
description: You're so going to bond with your Homeys, because these slippers are ready to serve you all day at home or out and about town in total comfort. It's an easy on-and-off shoe, with a cushioned and durable rubber outsole, 100% natural cork insole, and breathable upper. The house shoe, redefined.

name: KRUZERS 2.0 SHOE
description: Easy and wearable, the KRUZERS 2.0's subtle details set it apart from the pack. With trim on the laces, a traction outsole, and a molded Ortholite insole, you'll have all day comfort on lock. Available in multiple colors and fabrications—like textile, suede, and canvas—elevate your everyday look with the ultimate in versatility.

name: H2O-DRI ONE AND ONLY HAT
description: THE HURLEY H2O-DRI ONE AND ONLY HAT IS MADE WITH A MOISTURE-WICKING SWEATBAND AND STRETCH FABRIC TO KEEP YOU DRY AND COMFORTABLE THROUGHOUT THE DAY AND A CLEAN HURLEY LOGO FOR A TIMELESS LOOK.

name: MANU SAFARI HAT
description: Behold the REEF safari hat in its natural habitat, which is on your head wherever you go. Made of cotton ripstop- it is tough yet comfortable. Take this one into the wild, whether on the beach or in the city.

name: DOWNPOUR STRAW HAT
description: Our take on the classic straw hat is a must this spring and summer. Breathable and lightweight, this hat is made to protect you in casual REEF style. A chin cord with a bead and knot, along with a stretch cotton sweatband, keep this hat comfortable and secure. And isn't that what life's about?

name: Outsider Waterman Sun Hat
description: Keep the vacation vibes going with your carefree attitude in the Quicksilver™ Waterman Outsider Sun Hat. This lightweight straw hat features a large logo flag across the front.

name: Big John Surf Safari Hat
description: Providing 360 degree sun protection, the Big John Men’s Hat keeps the adventure alive. A men’s safari hat made from heavy cotton twill for a slight structure, the Big John adds a woven label at the front and adjustable chin strap to keep it in place on the move

name: Surf Series Cap
description: The Surf Series Cap is a perfect addition to your surf accessories. Great for beach or surf with 50+ sun protection. Designed with detachable chin cord with toggle and neck flap.

name: Mens Psycho Tech+ 4/3mm Chest Zip Wetsuit
description: O’Neill’s PsychoTech combines the exclusive TechnoButter 3 neoprene with TechnoButter 3 Air Firewall insulation, Stitchless Seam technology with exterior Single Fluid Seam Weld, internal TB3X Tape and a F.U.Z.E Closure Sytem. Lighter, warmer, more insulating and quick drying with improved ease of entry. PsychoTech is the latest advancement in cold water wetsuit technology from the leaders in innovation for over 60 years.

name: Mens O'riginal 2mm Back Zip Short Sleeve Wetsuit
description: The ultimate package. The O’Riginal wetsuit ticks all the right boxes. Classic style paired with modern technology and the best fit in the industry.

name: Mens Reactor II 2mm Back Zip Shorty Wetsuit
description: Get a full dose of performance technology at incredible value. The Reactor II Series utilises our exclusive FluidFlex™ in the shoulder and sleeves, a fully adjustable super seal neck and Krypto knee Padz. Everything you could possibly want in an entry level wetsuit.

name: E7 Flashbomb HeatSeeker 4\3 Zip Free Wetsuit
description: The new E7 Flashbomb HeatSeeker 4/3 Zip Free Wetsuit is our most technically advanced cold-water wetsuit. This season, we're combining our all new E7 Flash Lining through out the wetsuit and our unique Version 2 Flex Energy lining that generates even more heat when stretched. Along with added superior technical features, the Flashbomb Heat Seeker is our warmest and stretchiest Flashbomb yet.

name: E-Bomb 5\4mm Hooded Zip Free Wetsuit
description: The E-Bomb 5/4 Hooded Zip Free Wetsuit is the season's ultimate, high performance fullsuit featuring our signature E6 neoprene with Thermo Lining throughout the entire suit. We've also combined these features with our newest zip free entry system for maximum paddling freedom and water seal so you can embrace the elements and enjoy longer sessions.

name: Dawn Patrol 4\3 Back Zip Wetsuit
description: The Dawn Patrol is the wetsuit for the surfer who wants high performance and durability, providing great service whilst also being great value. Designed with E5 flash lining, back mesh skin panels and E4 thermoflex neoprene, this 4/3 back zip steamer will keep you warm in even the coldest waters, all winter long.

name: KNOCKAROUND BRIGHTSIDES MEN'S POLARIZED SUNGLASSES
description: There’s nothing better than a sunny day out in nature, and our collection of Brightsides unisex sunglasses fit the occasion perfectly. Whether you’re playing in the surf with friends or taking in views on a rejuvenating hike, Brightsides sunglasses take your adventures above and beyond with their solid construction and stylish vibe. Durable and reliable like other Knocks with a reasonable price tag, Brightsides are our next staple that we’re beyond stoked to share.

name: ELECTRIC BRISTOL MEN'S POLARIZED SUNGLASSES
description: Built for outdoor passions, the Bristol is a large square-shaped frame with top and side flanges for added solar and wind protection. From land to sea, and everywhere in-between, the Bristol provides performance features and great coverage in a lightweight package.

name: OTIS COASTIN SLIM MEN'S POLARIZED SUNGLASSES
description: Refined beach style. This frame brings everything you love about our Coastin frame into something slimmer and more precise. Its comfy fit, light yet strong build, and wrapping shape has light blocked from all angles in eyewear you can wear all day. An all-rounder that suits most face shapes.

name: ELECTRIC ELSINORE MEN'S POLARIZED SUNGLASSES
description: The Electric Elsinore Men's Polarized Sunglasses. A throwback aviator inspired by the early desert motorbikes of the past. This medium-large classic shape wears well on women and men. The legend of the Elsinore lives on.

name: DRAGON REEL X LL MEN'S POLARIZED SUNGLASSES
description: The Dragon Reel X LL Men's Polarized Sunglasses. With a slightly larger design, the Reel X provides max coverage with style. Rubber temple tips, floatable leash, and nose pads keep the reel secure. H2O floatable technology paired with Performance Polarized lenses offer the ultimate lightweight sunglass for all day comfort, whether you’re surf casting or trolling.

name: PIT VIPER THE SLAMMIN' ELLIPTICAL MEN'S SUNGLASSES
description: This is the Pit Viper The Slammin' Elliptical Men's Sunglasses Features: UVA & UVB Protection: 100% Light Transmission: 13% Lens: 2.2mm Polycarbonate Lens Look Thru Color: Brown

name: SPY REBAR ANSI MEN'S POLARIZED SUNGLASSES
description: The Spy Rebar ANSI Men's Sunglasses. Rebar left bold in the dust and ripped straight through to brazen. With a Z87.2+ ANSI rating, they are more sheer force of nature than shades. Tough, lightweight, and built for those with big dome energy, these ANSI-safety sunglasses deliver the clarity and colossal individuality we all seek.
